excerpt: If you're looking for the release date and time of Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9, here are all the details you need.

text: The Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time are right around the corner. As per the official schedule, the upcoming ninth and final episode of the season will be titled “Everything Becomes Symbol and Irony,” where we will see Coop fight for his freedom. Your Friends & Neighbors is a dark comedy-drama series created by Jonathan Tropper. Jon Hamm takes the center stage, along with Olivia Munn, Amanda Peet, Mark Tallman, and Hoon Lee, in the primary cast. So, here’s everything you need to know about when and where the final episode of Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 will become available for streaming. When is the Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 release date & time? The episode’s release date is Friday, May 30, 2025, and its release time is 6:00 PM PT and 9:00 PM ET. In regions outside the US, it will release a day later on May 17, 2025. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 30, 20259:00 PMPacific TimeMay 30, 20256:00 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 right here. Where to watch Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 You can watch Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 via Apple TV Plus. Apple TV Plus is a popular subscription-based streaming service that offers numerous other acclaimed hits for you to binge from the comfort of your home. These include Murderbot, Severance, Ted Lasso, and Shrinking, to name a few. What is Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 about? The official synopsis for Your Friends & Neighbors is as follows: “When a financial titan suddenly finds himself divorced and jobless, he starts robbing his wealthy neighbors to stay afloat. Stealing from his own social circle strangely exhilarates him—but he gradually gets tangled in a deadly web.”
html:
The Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 release date and time are right around the corner. As per the official schedule, the upcoming ninth and final episode of the season will be titled “Everything Becomes Symbol and Irony,” where we will see Coop fight for his freedom. Your Friends & Neighbors is a dark comedy-drama series created by Jonathan Tropper. Jon Hamm takes the center stage, along with Olivia Munn, Amanda Peet, Mark Tallman, and Hoon Lee, in the primary cast.

So, here’s everything you need to know about when and where the final episode of Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 will become available for streaming.

When is the Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is Friday, May 30, 2025, and its release time is 6:00 PM PT and 9:00 PM ET. In regions outside the US, it will release a day later on May 17, 2025.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 right here.

Where to watch Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9

You can watch Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 Episode 9 via Apple TV Plus.

Apple TV Plus is a popular subscription-based streaming service that offers numerous other acclaimed hits for you to binge from the comfort of your home. These include Murderbot, Severance, Ted Lasso, and Shrinking, to name a few.

What is Your Friends & Neighbors Season 1 about?

The official synopsis for Your Friends & Neighbors is as follows:

“When a financial titan suddenly finds himself divorced and jobless, he starts robbing his wealthy neighbors to stay afloat. Stealing from his own social circle strangely exhilarates him—but he gradually gets tangled in a deadly web.”
